Package com.stuypulse.stuylib.control

Class PIDCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stuypulse.stuylib.control.Controller
      • com.stuypulse.stuylib.control.PIDCalculator
  • public class PIDCalculator
extends Controller
    This is a Bang-Bang controller that while controlling the robot, will be able to calculate the values for the PID controller. It does this by taking the results of oscillations, then creating a PIDController withe the correct values once the oscilations have been measured.
